dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8712 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2600 Michigan Avenue in Kissimmee, Florida, as the “Robert Guevara Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Soto introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2600 Michigan Avenue in Kissimmee, Florida, as the Robert Guevara Post Office Building.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2600 Michigan Avenue in Kissimmee, Florida, shall be known and designated as the Robert Guevara Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Robert Guevara Post Office Building.
